name: Metronome (MatthewBurr, Shinnya)
description:
A turn based fighting game where you don't have your own turn - both turns happen at the same time! A competitive fighting game without the need for high actions per minute but with an emphasis on micro decisions.

*Play Solo or with a friend locally!*

Controls and gameplay:

  • W - Charge up for for an attack (Max 3 charges)
  • A - Block
  • S - Super Attack (Consumes 3 charges)
  • D - Attack (Consumes 1 charges)

Select your attack before the bar is empty to lock in your move!

Created by: Horizon Drift

  • Jordan Cleeve
  • Matthew Burr
  • Josh Thieme
  • Connor Taylor-Brown

For : Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018

Music publicly available by BoxCatGames  and HotFire
